title: Provides for the trustees of the state university of New York to establish a college of engineering and applied sciences in the city of Yonkers
summary: Provides for the trustees of the state university of New York to establish a four-year college of engineering and applied sciences in the city of Yonkers within the state university system.

       AN ACT to amend the education  law,  in  relation  to  providing  for  a
         college of engineering and applied sciences within the state universi-
         ty  of  New  York  system;  and to authorize the trustees of the state
         university of New York to establish a four-year SUNY college of  engi-
         neering and applied sciences in the city of Yonkers

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section  352  of  the  education  law,  as
    2  amended  by  chapter  552  of  the  laws  of 1985, is amended to read as
    3  follows:
    4    3. The state university shall consist of the four  university  centers

    6  of arts and sciences at Brockport, Buffalo, Cortland, Fredonia, Geneseo,

    9  empire state college, the agricultural and technical colleges at Alfred,

   12  college of environmental science and  forestry,  maritime  college,  the
   13  college  of technology at Utica/Rome, the statutory or contract colleges
   14  at Cornell university and Alfred university, and such additional univer-
   15  sities, colleges and other institutions, facilities and research centers
   16  as have been or hereafter may  be  acquired,  established,  operated  or

   18  tees.
   19    S 2. (a) The trustees of the state university of New York  are  hereby
   20  authorized  and  directed  to immediately take all actions to create and
   21  establish within the state university system, and subject to the  juris-
   22  diction  of such board of trustees, a college of engineering and applied

    3    (b)  The  board  of  trustees of the state university shall select the
    4  location of such college within the city of Yonkers and provide for such

    7    (c)  The  purpose  of this college of engineering and applied sciences
    8  shall be to offer majors in  industrial/manufacturing,  engineering  and
    9  technology,  transportation  engineering  and technology, computer engi-
   10  neering and technology, telecommunications engineering  and  technology,
   11  environmental  engineering  and  technology,  biomedical engineering and
   12  technology, civil engineering and technology and the history of  econom-
   13  ics of science and technology.
   14    (d)  The  board  of trustees of the state university of New York shall
   15  conduct all the duties required under article 8  of  the  education  law
   16  upon  the  establishment  of the state university of New York college of
   17  engineering and applied sciences at Yonkers, establish  a  master  plan,
   18  establish  standards  and promulgate any necessary rules and regulations
   19  for the establishment of such college.
   20    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.
